description: File Number: W8476-246761/A NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Qty three (3), Truck Ambulances 4x4 Type 1 and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HP-19AMBU. The requested delivery date is 120 days after receipt of order (ARO). GSIN: 2310 This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19AMBU/B. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-912-78081 As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on CanadaBuys for a period of fourty (40) calendar days. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
### Truck Ambulances 4x4 Type 1 - Solicitation

The Department of National Defence [HQ] is releasing a solicitation for the supply of three (3) Truck Ambulances 4x4 Type 1 and related items, according to the terms of Supply Arrangement E60HP-19AMBU.

**Reference Information:**

* Solicitation number: W8476-246761/A
* Amendment number: 1
* Procurement ID: cb-448-7375109
* Publication date: December 7, 2023
* Closing date for bids: January 17, 2024 at 14:00 (EST)
* Amendment date: January 17, 2024

**Key Information:**

* Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Category: Goods Distribution
* Method: Selective Tendering
* Evaluation criteria: Low Price

**Key Terms:**

* The Solicitation reserves the right to negotiate with bidders at any stage.
* Suppliers must hold a current Supply Arrangement under RFSA E60HP-19AMBU/B.
* Bidders are required to comply with relevant Canadian trade agreements.
* The Crown reserves the right to conclude a contract with the bidder who offers the best technical proposal and price.

**Procurement Process:**

* Suppliers are invited to submit a bid by January 17, 2024 at 14:00 (EST)
* Contact instructions may be found in the documents attached to this solicitation
* Costs and times to delivery should be clearly identified
* Relevant documents may be accessed at CanadaBuys

**Contact:**

* Dong Le  
* Department of National Defence  
* Phone: (999) 999-9999  
* Email: dong.le@forces.gc.ca

### Annex Information

Documents in English and French versions [available at CanadaBuys]. Attachments are not provided due to the information received.

### Status and Evaluation

* The notice is open. All interested suppliers may submit their quotations before the closing date.
* The selection of the most relevant and beneficial solution will be based on the evaluation criteria outlined above. The solliciteur [HQ] will, however, not communicate a comparison of prices to the interested Bidders.  
 
Submitted by Jeanette mannholwer.
